game.name: EXONAUTIS
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Dive into the underwater depths of a rich and mysterious alien world. From lush and vibrant alien coral reefs to dark depths where giant nightmares lurk, you must craft equipment, pilot new vehicles and build new outposts to uncover the truth hidden in the abyssal depths of planet Eo-III.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the underwater depths of a rich and mysterious alien world. From lush and vibrant alien coral reefs to dark depths where giant nightmares lurk, you must craft equipment, pilot new vehicles and build new outposts to uncover the truth hidden in the abyssal depths of planet Eo-III.
